Events.OnCreate:
(block (korolovDesc)
(switch ; This mission only works in the starting system
(not (eq (sysGetNode) (objGetProperty gPlayerShip 'startingSystem))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Make sure there exists a Korolov station somewhere in the ; universe.
(not (setq korolovDesc (map (unvFindObj "t +korolovShipping; +populated;") (list 'reduceMin 'original) theDesc (sysGetTopologyDistance (sysGetNode) (@ theDesc 2)) ))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Set up the mission
(block Nil ; Remember the system and station ID
(msnSetData gSource 'korolovNodeID (@ korolovDesc 2)) (msnSetData gSource 'korolovID (@ korolovDesc 0)) ) ) )

Language.Text:
(cat "Travel to the " (sysGetName (msnGetData gSource 'korolovNodeID)) " System and visit Korolov Shipping.

" "System: " (sysGetName (msnGetData gSource 'korolovNodeID)) "
" "Payment: None" )
